page.title: 11RESIDENTIAL BEMPTON/BUCKTON
page.content: As a selected settlement under the Humberside County Council's Structure Plan, Bempton is expanding. Housing needs are at present being met by the operations of two building sites. One of the sites is comprised of 2 and 3 bedroomed bungalows; these are aimed at the first time buyer and the retired. The second of the sites is for 3, 4 and five bedroomed family houses. As a non selected settlement, Buckton experiences very little development. The population of the area at the last census was 760 but this figure must have increased since then by something in the region of 50 more residents.
